item.title: 医療費が10万円超えたら還付されると聞いて確定申告しようと税務署行ったら悲しい現実を突きつけられた話 - Togetter
Rye Language
item.description: Rye is a dynamic programming language in development. It's inspired by Rebol, Factor and Linux shell. Interpreter is made in Go and Rye owes a lot to it's solid libraries that are easy to integrate. It's focused on the back-end, information retrieval and (pre)processing.
